name: A Cliche Romance
description:
Sypnopsis:

It's your last year in high school. You're pretty sociable and try to become friends with Aoi, a girl famous for her stunning looks and intelligence. Although she's had countless of boys confess to her, she always seems to be turning them down. Will you be able to win her heart over?  

Features:

Female protagonist with editable name

4 different endings

7.5k words

Credit:

Story: peachypink

Art: Noraneko Games, Elzee, Tara, CreativeFreaks, Uncle Mugen

Music: Kevin MacLead
